bitMan: Buddha Institute of Technology BTech/MBA/MCA/UG Courses cutoff 2023 (Round 1) has been released by AKTU. Buddha Institute of Technology BTech Admissions are based on JEE Mains Score followed by UPTAC Counselling. Further, Round 2 Choice filling (JEE Main/ NATA) is ongoing and the last date to register is September 21. For CUET and CUET PG, Round 2 registration will be done on September 23.JEE Main/ NATA & CUET UG and CUET PG Round 2 Seat allotment will be released on September 22 & September 23 respectively. Candidates seeking admission can confirm their online willingness (Freeze/ Float) from September 22 - September 24, 2024. For CUET UG and CUET PG, online willingness confirmation will take place from September 23 -25, 2023.
Bit: Buddha Institute of Technology (BIT) is one of the top technical colleges in Gorakhpur. The institute comes under the aegis of Buddha Group of Institutions. BIT offers undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma programs in the discipline of Engineering and Polytechnic. Admission is done on the basis of merit and cutoff criteria of the institute.
